definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Said, I really miss you, darling.
sentences.chinese: 说，我真的好想你，亲爱的。

sentences.english: Demetrious: you are here, my dear Hermia! I found you for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 你在这里，我亲爱的荷米亚，我找你找了好久。

sentences.english: So dear friends , let's open our hearts and ears to enjoy music .
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的朋友，让我们敞开心灵和张开双耳去感受音乐。

sentences.english: Dear colleagues, a pleasant journey, I remember thinking of us, always come back together sometime.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的同事，一路顺风，记得想念我们，常回来聚聚。

sentences.english: So, dear young people, please speak up for peace.
sentences.chinese: 所以，亲爱的青年朋友，请为和平仗义执言。

sentences.english: Xoxo, darling, I gonna to bed.
Oh, darling, refresh our memory. Our silver wedding anniversary is coming.
sentences.chinese: 噢，亲爱的，回忆一下，我们的银婚纪念日快到了。

sentences.english: 'My dear cousin,I don't eat that kind of food in my house.
sentences.chinese: 我的亲爱的堂兄弟，我在我的房子里不吃那种食品。

sentences.english: Darling, that was wonderful for you.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，对你来说那是美妙的。

sentences.english: Have we not some relatives in those parts, my dear sister?
sentences.chinese: ‘亲爱的妹子，我们有些亲戚住在那里吗？’

sentences.english: Baby, I'm in so deep and you know I believed .
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，我陷入的太深，你知道我是很用情。

sentences.english: Good-bye, my sweet heart. I kiss you and the children many thousand times.
sentences.chinese: 再见了，我亲爱的，千万次地吻你和孩子们。

sentences.english: Of course I’m listening to you, dear.
Darling' is a term of endearment.
Dear, you are responsible to support the family and I am responsible for my beauty.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，你负责赚钱养家，我负责貌美如花。

definition: phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
wish you all the best! (when signing off on a correspondence)
(slang) alternative for 哎呦[ai1 you1] "oh my!"
darlings/fans/followers/short form of 親愛的們|亲爱的们
